snippet: Travelers from Mali will be subject to the same screening and monitoring that was ordered for people arriving from three other Ebola-affected countries, U.S. health officials said Sunday....

headline.print_headline: US to Screen Travelers From Mali for Ebola
headline.main: US to Screen Travelers From Mali for Ebola

lead_paragraph: Travelers from Mali will be subject to the same screening and monitoring that was ordered for people arriving from three other Ebola-affected countries, U.S. health officials said Sunday.
